trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gypsum
There were no other sightings in Gypsum on or around September 23rd 2013
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the 7th time I have seen this thing along the RR Tracks that run along the Colorado river north of Dot Zero exit off of I 70. I have been seeing it for over 28 years. It seems to bee around the same area each time I have seen it. It seems to change its color to match the background and move very fast in any direction it wants to go. I have seen Black Hawk choppers around almost every time. STRANGE. It just seems to be checking things out but what I have no idea? I have been in this beautiful area for over 40 years and have seen a lot of strange things and Black Hawk Choppers are always around when I have the sightings.
